sub_title: Coordinator ◾️ Logistics ◾️ Procurement ◾️ Marine ◾️ International ◾️ Bachelor ◾️
summary:
I am a creative and highly motivated person with a positive attitude to life. Big fan of sports and cooking, I am an energetic person who tries to bring a positive vibe to any situation.

As a professional, I believe in clear communication and taking opportunities to improve systems and people, to encourage a more efficient workflow, as well as improving knowledge of processes, both in a general and more detailed capacity.

In my career I had the opportunity to work in different departments, all aligned to my bachelors' degree. I have a great affinity for people and believe in sharing knowledge and collaborating to achieve the best solutions for both the customer and the company.

On a personal level I am a big fan of living a healthy lifestyle. I love to cook Italian, Mexican, Thai and Vegetarian food and work with the Barbecue. In my spare time I do Fitness, Cycling and Rowing and am open to other sport activities.

education.field_of_study: Marketing  / Commerciële economie (CE) Minor International Marketing

profile_positions.description: In this role I am a logistics coordinator of bulk marine movements within the EMEAI region handling inland barge movements. In addition I am responsible for coordinating import vessels from the US, export vessels to the Middle-East, South-Africa and South America. I plan, communicate and coordinate voyages. I monitor the schedule and solve problems for the best possible result. I liaison between external parties in particular brokers, owners, surveyors, terminals, agents and our internal parties like members of supply chain, vetting, quality, outplant coordinators and jetty operations. I am the first contact for any question regarding the voyage, pricing, contract and projected time of arrival.
profile_positions.title: Logistiek coördinator

profile_positions.description:
As a sourcing Technologist I am alligned to the bulk marine, terminals and surveyors purchasing category. I am responsible for the procurement of bulk marine voyages originating from the EMEA region. I am working closely together with external brokers in canvassing the market, finding suitable solutions, presenting them to the business and negotiating terms for spot movements.
In my role I function as a liaison between business requestors, external brokers and the Dow marine operational team. Next to my bulk marine responsibilities, I am also working with our International trade team on the procurement of LCL movements originating from the EMEA region. And supporting the regional category leader on tender set-up and contractual negotiations.
profile_positions.title: Sourcing Technologist

profile_positions.description:
Sample Management | Cross Business | Customer Service | Supply Chain & Logistics |
As a sample coordinator I am responsible for coordinating the sample process for multiple businesses within the EMEAI region (Europe, Middle East, Africa and India). My main tasks are providing our external sample provider SGS with sample stock, correct documentation and instructions on how to sample. Furthermore, I am focal point for the sample order entry team located in Mumbai, India. Finally, I proactively address long-term improvements and reactively solve current issues on a continual basis.
To show my commitment to continual improvement I volunteered for the role of internal auditor, have completed the course and got my certification. after, I started preparing my team for the audit for the ISO 9001 certificate.
profile_positions.title: Business Sample Specialist

profile_positions.description: As a Customer Service Representative, I was responsible for DOW distributors in Spain and France. My main tasks were receiving and processing orders, being the liaison between customer and DOW internal departments and making sure the customers got their products in accordance with the Business service standards.
profile_positions.title: Cross business Customer Service Representative

profile_positions.description:
| Thesis | Customer Satistaction | Customer Loyalty | Quality | Analysis | Purchasing | 

I completed my thesis about customer satisfaction and customer loyalty. I mapped out the service quality of the Baeckermat. I did this by researching theories of B2C customer service, B2C customer loyalty, service quality and research methods. Next, I analysed the current customer satisfaction and loyalty. After comparing the theoretical data with the numerical evidence, I was able to recommend changes. These changes had a positive impact on purchasing, services, tangible assets and social media usage.
profile_positions.title: Bachelor Thesis Student

profile_positions.description:
| Philips | Lighting | Purchasing | Critical Components | 

My main task was searching for back-up suppliers of critical production materials within Europe and China. Furthermore, I was involved in assisting the Purchasing department with administrative work, requesting RFIs and RFQs.
profile_positions.title: Internship Purchasing department

profile_positions.description:
| Cofely | Commercial | Promotion | Marketing | Sales | Roparun | 

Assisting the Commercial department with SAP entries. Assisting the Cofely-EPZ Roparun team with preparations. Accompanying the Sales Representative with customer visits. Assisting the commercial department with RFQ's and RFI's.
profile_positions.title: Internship Commercial Department
